pullRequest.title: Harden Frontend API Client
pullRequest.description:
This submission hardens the frontend API client by introducing a centralized `request<T>` wrapper. This wrapper ensures consistent authentication, typed error handling with a custom `ApiError` class, and support for request cancellation via `AbortSignal`. The refactoring also includes the setup of a new Vitest testing environment and a comprehensive test suite for the API client.

---
*PR created automatically by Jules for task [4149501313246570403](https://jules.google.com/task/4149501313246570403) started by @g2gonee2025-cloud*

This submission migrates the frontend application from a state-based tab navigation system to a more robust and scalable routing solution using `react-router-dom`. This change improves the user experience by enabling direct navigation to specific pages via URLs and lays the groundwork for future feature development.

This change fixes the mounting of the `DashboardView` component by re-implementing `react-router-dom` for navigation. The previous state-based navigation has been replaced with a more robust routing solution, and related components have been updated to use standard routing hooks.
